solution_line_template: For the distance she traveled, Elise paid {total_paid} - {base_price} = <<{total_paid}-{base_price}={cost_for_distance}>>{cost_for_distance} dollars

Since the cost per mile is ${cost_per_mile}, the distance from Elise's house to the hospital is {cost_for_distance}/{cost_per_mile} = <<{cost_for_distance}/{cost_per_mile}={distance_miles}>>{distance_miles} miles.
